decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A1000, A10001, A1002, A1010, A1100, A1110, A1111, A1112, A1120, Flood Risk Assessment matrix (unnumbered, no date). Received on 13.05.16) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of three storey side extension, front canopy and single storey rear extension following demolition of an existing single storey side extension.
